text: To celebrate Fall TV and our huge Fall TV Preview issue — hitting stands on Sept. 15 — EW is bringing you 50 scoops in 50 days, a daily dish on some of your favorite shows. Follow the hashtag # 50Scoops50Days on Twitter and Instagram to keep up with the latest, and check EW. com / 50 - Scoops for all the news and surprises. Get ready, Once Upon a Time fans : Jennifer Morrison will be reprising her role as Emma Swan for what the OUAT bosses are calling “ an emotional curtain call ” — and EW has the exclusive first look. At the close of season 6, Morrison exited the ABC fairy tale drama. However, her character, Emma, will return for one episode in season 7, the Hook -
